verses.verse: Being therefore <S%G3767><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, we have <S%G2192><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> had our access <S%G4318><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> we stand <S%G2476><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> we rejoice <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> so <S%G235><s%>, but we also <S%G2532><s%> rejoice <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our tribulations <S%G2347><s%>: knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> stedfastness <S%G5281><s%>;
and <S%G1161><s%> stedfastness <S%G5281><s%>, approvedness <S%G1382><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> approvedness <S%G1382><s%>, hope <S%G1680><s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> putteth <S%G2617><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to shame <S%G2617><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> hath been shed abroad <S%G1632><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> while <S%G5607><s%> we <S%G2257><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> weak <S%G772><s%>, in due <S%G2596><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> scarcely <S%G3433><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> a righteous man <S%G1342><s%> will <S%G599><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> die <S%G599><s%>: for <S%G5228><s%> peradventure <S%G5029><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the good man <S%G18><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> one would <S%G5111><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> dare <S%G5111><s%> to die <S%G599><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> commendeth <S%G4921><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, in that <S%G3754><s%>, while <S%G5607><s%> we <S%G2257><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

Much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, being <S%G1344><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, shall we be saved <S%G4982><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%>, while we were <S%G5607><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%>, we were reconciled <S%G2644><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%>, being reconciled <S%G2644><s%>, shall we be saved <S%G4982><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> so <S%G235><s%>, but we <S%G2744><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> rejoice <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2983><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> the reconciliation <S%G2643><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, for <S%G1909><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sinned <S%G264><s%>: â€”

for <S%G1063><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is <S%G1677><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> imputed <S%G1677><s%> when there is <S%G5607><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> law <S%G3551><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them that had <S%G264><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> sinned <S%G264><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of <S%G3847><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%>'s transgression <S%G3847><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a figure <S%G5179><s%> of him that was to come <S%G3195><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the trespass <S%G3900><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is the free gift <S%G5486><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> by the trespass <S%G3900><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%> died <S%G599><s%>, much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> did the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the gift <S%G1431><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, abound <S%G4052><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> that sinned <S%G264><s%>, so is the gift <S%G1434><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> came of <S%G1537><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> condemnation <S%G2631><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the free gift <S%G5486><s%> came of <S%G1537><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> trespasses <S%G3900><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> justification <S%G1345><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%>, by <S%G3900><s%> the trespass <S%G3900><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%>, death <S%G2288><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%>; much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall they that receive <S%G2983><s%> the abundance <S%G4050><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the gift <S%G1431><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%>, even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> trespass <S%G3900><s%> the judgment came unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> condemnation <S%G2631><s%>; even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> act of righteousness <S%G1345><s%> the free gift came unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> justification <S%G1347><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s disobedience <S%G3876><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%> were made <S%G2525><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, even <S%G3779><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of the one <S%G1520><s%> shall <S%G2525><s%> the many <S%G4183><s%> be made <S%G2525><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> came <S%G3922><s%> in besides <S%G2443><s%>, that the trespass <S%G3900><s%> might abound <S%G4121><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> abounded <S%G4121><s%>, grace <S%G5485><s%> did abound more exceedingly <S%G5248><s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> reigned <S%G936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> might <S%G936><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
